messages.1000085115: Enter the direction key twice or press the direction key together with Shift key to evade to that direction.\n#yInvincible for {0} sec when skill is used

messages.1000094613: Enter Special Attack Button on a knocked-down enemy to stomp on the enemy. Moving during this attack will cancel the skill.\n#yATK {0}%
messages.1000094614: Enter Special Attack Button during Jump to hit the enemies below with the secondary weapon and bound them\n#yATK {0}%

messages.1000003816: Evade enemies attacks using #y[Blink]#w even when paralyzed.\n#yCooldown: {0} sec
messages.1000003812: When launched into the air by an enemy,\nenter #[Jump]#w key to reposition yourself.\n#yCooldown: {0} sec
